snippet: Vladimir V. Putin, the Russian prime minister, appears headed for certain victory in elections on Sunday that would return him to the presidency. But has the macho tough guy image that helped maintain his popularity begun to fade after waves of...
abstract: Vladimir V. Putin, the Russian prime minister, appears headed for certain victory in elections on Sunday that would return him to the presidency. But has the macho tough guy image that helped maintain his popularity begun to fade after waves of protests among the formerly faithful?

headline.main: Has Putin Lost His Sex Appeal?
